node.title: Charges laid after school fight video appears to show woman waving fake gun
node.description: Police have charged a 20-year-old woman with carrying a fake gun with criminal intent and threatening to cause grievous bodily harm, after a video surfaced of a school fight in which a woman is seenâ€¦
node.content:
["Police have charged a 20-year-old woman with carrying a fake gun with criminal intent and threatening to cause grievous bodily harm, after a video surfaced of a school fight in which a woman is seen waving what appears to be a gun.", "", "
The 20-year-old will appear in the Manukau District Court. Photo: RNZ / Anneke Smith
", "Police today confirmed the gun was not real, but in fact a starter pistol for athletic races.", "The woman will appear in Manukau District Court.", "The woman is not a part of Otahuhu School, which the New Zealand Herald said the students involved attended, and the incident last Thursday was not on school grounds and happened after school hours."]
